All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminAllEventsActivity
Admin screen displaying all events from firebase
AdminAllowList
Simple class to hold eligible admin emails (only our group)
AdminAllUsersActivity
Admin screen displaying all user profiles from Firestore
AdminEventImagesActivity
Admin-only screen that shows all uploaded pictures along with the name of the event
AdminEventImagesAdapter
Adapter for the admin event images list to display the event images in a grid view along with the event name
AdminEventImagesAdapter.OnImageClickListener
Callback to notify when an image is clicked
AdminEventImagesAdapter.Row
Data holder for a row in the images list
AdminImagesDialogTest
Tests the delete-image confirmation dialog in AdminEventImagesActivity 1.
AdminImagesTest
Instrumentation test for the view images button
AdminLogsActivity
AdminLogsActivity
AdminLogsAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for the admin logs screen.
AdminLogsAdapter.Row
Row model for the logs list.
AdminLogsUiTest
Basic UI test for the admin logs screen
AdminMenuActivity
Main Admin Menu screen
AdminMenuTest
Simple tests that verify: 1.
AdminRemoveEventDialogTest
Tests the delete-event confirmation dialog in AdminAllEventsActivity.
AdminRemoveUserDialogTest
Tests the delete-user confirmation dialog in AdminAllUsersActivity.
CreateEventActivity
Activity responsible for creating new events with all required details.
CreateEventIntentTest
Intent tests for CreateEventActivity.
DashboardFilterTest
Tests the filtering functionality in the DashboardFragment (My Events).
DashboardFragment
Fragment displaying the user's personalized dashboard of events.
DashboardViewModel
ViewModel for the Dashboard Fragment.
DrawLotteryActivity
Activity that allows event organizers to perform the lottery draw.
DrawLotteryActivityTest
Intent tests for DrawLotteryActivity.
DrawReplacementActivity
Activity for drawing replacement entrants from the waitlist.
EditProfileActivity
This activity allows users to edit their profile information.
EntrantListActivity
Activity for displaying lists of entrants in different states.
EntrantListActivityTest
Intent tests for EntrantListActivity.
Event
Model class representing an event in the lottery system.
EventAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying event items in a list.
EventAdminAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for the all events admin list.
EventAdminAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Callback interface so the activity can react to row clicks
EventAdminAdapter.Row
row model for events.
EventDetailsActivity
Main activity for viewing event details.
EventTest
Unit tests for the Event model class.
HomeFilterTest
Tests the filtering functionality in the HomeFragment.
HomeFragment
Main home screen fragment displaying available events.
HomeFragmentScanTest
Robolectric tests that exercise the QR scan handling flow inside HomeFragment.
HomeFragmentScanTest.TestHomeFragment
Test double for HomeFragment that captures navigation and stubs dependencies.
HomeViewModel
ViewModel for the Home Fragment.
ImageUtils
Utility class for handling image operations, specifically base64 encoding/decoding.
MainActivity
The main activity of the application, responsible for hosting the bottom navigation bar and the navigation component that manages the app's main screens.
Notification
POJO which Stores the basic information of a notification
NotificationAdapter
Adapter class to display the notifications in a Recycler View Displays message, header, timestamp, and shows appropriate button
NotificationAdapter.NotificationViewHolder
View Holder class for holding a reference to the view in a notification
NotificationAdapterTest
 
NotificationOptOutTest
Tests the notification opt-out functionality in the Profile section.
NotificationSender
NotificationSender responsible for sending win and loss notifications after the lottery is drawn.
NotificationsFragment
Refactored Fragment for displaying the notifications of a current user Data fetching is injectable for unit testing
NotificationsViewModel
 
NotificationTest
 
ProfileAndEditActivityTest
This class tests the full user profile flow, from registration to editing and deletion.
ProfileFragment
A UI controller that displays the user's profile information.
ProfileViewModel
A ViewModel that acts as a lifecycle-aware data holder for the ProfileFragment.
ProfileViewModel.OnDeleteProfileListener
 
QRCodeDialogFragment
Dialog fragment for displaying an event's QR code.
RegistrationActivity
This activity handles user registration.
RegistrationActivityTest
This class contains intent tests for the RegistrationActivity.
SplashActivity
SplashActivity serves as the initial entry point of the application.
User
Model class representing a user/entrant.
UserAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying user/entrant lists.
UserAdminAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for the all user admin list
UserAdminAdapter.OnUserClickListener
 
UserAdminAdapter.UserRow
Simple row model to hold data
UserTest
Unit tests for the User model class.
WaitlistMapActivity
Creates an activity where the users on the waitlist are displayed on a google map api
WaitlistUiTest
These tests test the join/leave waitlist functionality Works with any user regardless if they're on the waitlist already or not Eg: If button shows "join waitlist" we expect it to change to "leave waitlist" and vice versa Notes: does not test firebase write/read functionality, only the UI changes
